name: Possible Exploitation of Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
description: Detects log entries that appear in exploitation attempts against MS Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
false_positives: Unknown, please report false positives via https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/issues
query: (winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND event.code:(6 OR 8) AND Data:(/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd][Ll][Ee][Tt]\ [Ff][Aa][Ii][Ll][Ee][Dd]\.\ [Cc][Mm][Dd][Ll][Ee][Tt]\ [Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Pp][Pp],\ .*/ OR /.*[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk]\ [Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Pp][Pp]\ [Tt][Hh][Rr][Oo][Ww][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ [Uu][Nn][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee][Dd]\ [Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\:\ [Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Ii][Nn][Vv][Aa][Ll][Ii][Dd][Cc][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\:.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND event.code:(6 OR 8) AND Data:(*Cmdlet\ failed.\ Cmdlet\ Get\-App,\ * OR *Task\ Get\-App\ throwing\ unhandled\ exception\:\ System.InvalidCastException\:*))`
